website_summaries.verdict: A versatile lanyard that offers a neck, wrist, or hand strap for a secure and reliable way to hold your phone.
pros: Allows you to choose between a neck, wrist, or hand strap
Made from strong and reliable material
Attaches securely behind phone case on most smartphones
Strong clip allows you to quickly detach phone to answer calls
Neck lanyard is a comfortable length
cons: Lanyard requires a phone case for attachment

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This worked great for me! I used it on a trip to Italy, and it made taking pictures with one hand much easier without the fear of dropping my phone. I also didn't worry about someone snatching my phone out of my hand. I did have to thread the leash through a speaker hole rather than the power port hole, but that worked just fine. I found that charging my phone was too difficult with the leash through the power port. Very happy with this purchase, overall!
customer_reviews.author: Bad Marge

customer_reviews.title: Is amazing..
customer_reviews.text: Is amazing... Exactly what i was looking for. I don't have to worry about loosing my phone anymore. And the whole screen is visible. My picores come out great and don’t have reove it, even when I clean my phone because the lanyard stays with the case. I work at a high school and this kids don’t get impressed with much, but I’m constantly ask by my students, staff, and friends were did I get it?... simply amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Worked great as a phone leash during an intensive sight-seeing trip abroad!
customer_reviews.text: It fit on Samsung 6 and Iphone 8 with no problem. Although tight cases might be a little disrupted by the extra thickness of the strap running between it and the phone. This was great for wearing around neck or knotting around a shoulder strap so a phone won't fall out or get pick-pocketed. Great for taking photos where there is a chance of dropping the phone or losing it. (like leaning over the railings somewhere trying to get a shot!) The release allows you to unhitch it easily and the remaining strap still attached to the phone can work as a wrist strap. Worked as advertized. Looked as pictured. A good product!
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO ATTACH TO PHONE CASE!
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to find a Note8 lanyard. This was the only thing I could find that would not cover up my camera lens & fit exactly on my phone. It was so easy to do & I can use my own case! I can also charge my phone without taking it off! If a 67 yr old can do this so can you! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Suzieq

customer_reviews.title: Finally found what I've been looking for!
customer_reviews.text: Nice little leash! After browsing thru several similar products, this seems to fit what I'm looking for. it's not made of cheap silicone rubber like the others (didn't want to risk hanging my phone on those) and does not block the camera or get in the way of my side buttons. I also like how there's no adhesives and I can remove it when I want to but I'll probably wear it all the time as it's very convenient to just wear my phone around my neck when I'm on my phone every few minutes. The 3 in 1 design allows me to use it in many different situations. Very clever novel invention! I'll probably give these out for Xmas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible product. I got it for my 12-year-old son to use on a recent trip to Europe. The lanyard material was comfortable for him to wear all day and he didn't drop or lose his phone once! I got one for myself also and just used the wrist strap. Phones are a target for pickpockets and I felt safe and secure using the Foneleash. Five stars!
customer_reviews.author: AEK

customer_reviews.title: I don't know how I have lived without it!
customer_reviews.text: I don't know how I have lived without it! Got it for my first Europe trip since I was going to be in a variety of airports and countries and there for 10 days. Of course a few times in the trip I had a lot going on or in my hands or rushing and THIS saved me from loosing my phone. I've been home for weeks and have not taken it off. It works great on my wrist (though I can see this being to small for most men and even some women) great on the neck and good on sliding your hand in the back. Several of my friends I went with wanted one after seeing mine.
customer_reviews.author: Lina A Douglas

customer_reviews.title: Bad Quality Control
customer_reviews.text: This is my second foneleash. The first one I received was for some reason a child's hand size and I could not get my hand through the wrist strap. Unfortunately for me I had no way to return it for over 90 days. My second foneleash just came in. The wrist strap is the correct size - Hooray! But the retainer clip that holds the loose strap in place so that it does not flap was on the WRONG side. So there is no way to retain the loose strap. The concept and product design is simple and works well when it is made correctly. I am disappointed and will have to return the product due to this defect.
customer_reviews.author: TJB

customer_reviews.title: What a great idea!!!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this to my daughter for Christmas - she LOVES it! She uses it all the time. Allows her to keep her phone with her without having to worry about it falling on the ground or between bleachers. Also allows her to be hands free without having to shove her phone in her pocket or if she does not want to carry a purse. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Board Gaming Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great For When You Know You'll Be Grabbing Your Phone Frequently
customer_reviews.text: Great, reliable design. Lightweight. Muliple uses. Especially nice for travel, or when you are attending events where you know you'll be grabbing your phone a lot, but you want to keep your hands relatively free. There are a couple ways to carry your phone with this lanyard and the wrist/hand option can add security when you are taking more risky shots with your phone camera and don't wsnt to risk it slipping out of your hand. I bought it for one event, but it was so generally useful, my phone is now rarely seen without it. My friends and family members all want their own ! Oh, and its washable.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Wright

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly useful.
customer_reviews.text: So I have to admit that I bought this as a joke because my mother in law got her phone stolen in a public restroom. I thought it was hilarious so I gave it to her for Christmas expecting her to never actually use it. Well she uses it daily and it’s attached to her phone all the time. She said it helps her find her phone in her purse or car when it falls down to the bottom or in the side of the seat. From what I’ve seen it looks really useful and I like the clip feature so you can take the loop part off when you don’t need it. Overall it was a good gift!
customer_reviews.author: S.M.

customer_reviews.title: Works with battery case!
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a lanyard that works with my battery case! I was a little concerned that the fabric thickness would cause an issue with the case not fitting properly over the lanyard, but it really is not a problem. Four stars only because the lanyard fabric is somewhat slippery, which causes the need to have to tighten the strap throughout the day. Oh, and the length of lanyard if worn around the neck is too long for me overall - I'm 5'3", and my iPhone 6 Plus ends up hanging well below the belly button - too low for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Larissa H.

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: I have arthritis so it's challenging to hold my cell phone. I hold it a lot. This product gives me a few optional ways to carry it butholding it still causes frustration for me. Not the fault of this product at all! All I'm saying is, if it helps me, it can help anybody. I hold the strap on the back or put my wrist through the dangling part below the clasp. Originally purchased for shopping but the lanyard is also very helpful.
customer_reviews.author: DG

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I used this while visiting a theme park and it was so handy! I paired it with a phone case with a slide-out card holder and kept my park tickets there. I had read a review that after a while the leash starts to loosen and judging by the material I think it would, so I used a safety pin to hold the end in place. I really enjoyed having my phone out (but not in my hand) all day so I could take pictures in a hurry.
customer_reviews.author: PinupPeacock

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product that works as intended!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! I never have pockets on my pants so it's great to be able to wear my phone around my neck. Pattern is really cool, too. The instructions are clear and the message from the company (pictured) made me feel my money went to a good place.
customer_reviews.author: Bret

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a sturdy product. But for me it had a significant flaw. Using the wrist lanyard as it was designed, it was impossible to use my cellphone as a camera--it held my hand so close to the camera that my hand would block either the camera lens or the screen on the front which allowed me to frame the picture. I came up with a way to redesign the lanyard so that it worked for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Good, but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It was alright. The strap that was attached to the phone often came loose. It also doesn’t work unsee you have case that doesn’t disrupt any of the holes in the case. The design is hearts which some people might not like. I find it worked best with the Samsung phones because of the placement of the camera. It just made the balance better. Hope this helped.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Barton

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed. Works perfectly. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly with my Pixel and an Otterbox case. Instructions were very clear both written and pictures. Charger still fits camera works fine and finger sensor unaffected. Hopefully this will keep me from misplacing my cell phone!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of Twins

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful
customer_reviews.text: I have mobility issues and this leash helps me access my phone quicker. I like that I can slip my hand into the leash and I have no fear of dropping it as I hold the phone. I am also given the option of carrying the phone on my wrist. I use the neck strap the most as I use a electric cart to get around and the phone hangs comfortably on my neck and a lot less trouble to access the phone than trying to dig it out of a pocket while seated on the scooter. I have been asked by some people of different ages where I purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: mica

customer_reviews.title: Love this lanyard
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for keeping my phone handy when I haven't any pockets or a handbag. I like how I can also use as a wristlet. It doesn't interfere with my camera or charging port. I purchased this to use for grocery shopping where I scan and bag items as I shop but I plan to leave it on my phone all the time. Much better than digging it out of my pocket every time I need to scan. And I won't drop my phone anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Diana P

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: Aside from cost this strap is perfect. It fit a Pixel 2, 3, and 3XL without issue. I like that it has a super low profile. The strap it self is smooth and tightly woven so low chance of fraying. I plan to buy more as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel de la Peña

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: It works well and seems secure. I just can't figure out how to tighten the strap so it doesn't hang so low. The strap is comfortable around my neck and that was really important to me. It also doesn't interfere with my camera which it seems like other wearable phone holders tend to do. Overall, a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Youaremysunshine

customer_reviews.title: Reliable and this does not cover the camera!
customer_reviews.text: Originally I ordered one of those silicone straps. It covers the camera on my android, so I had to return it and ordered this one instead. This one is awesome. It does not cover cameras nor USB opening. The neck strap can be detached from the wrist strap. Appears to be pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: KKB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for kids
customer_reviews.text: Both my kids are using these and the fact that it loops through the case means that as long as the case doesn't fall off, the strap stays attached. Our only issue has been the clip that allows you to disconnect that part of the strap near the phone from the neck strap. One of the kids quickly destroyed that clip, but we reconnected, reinforced, and just removed the ability for that to unclick, and the strap worked great through a Disney trip and numerous other trips and car rides. Once definite improvement would be the ability to adjust the length of the next strap, but I much prefer this solution to anything that requires adhesion.
customer_reviews.author: D. Crossman

customer_reviews.title: A must have when traveling or anywhere in a crowd.
customer_reviews.text: I love this foneleash! I used it on a recent trip to New Orleans for Mardi Gras. Rather than wearing the lanyard around my neck, I looped it through a belt loop on my jeans and put my phone in a pocket. My phone was always accessible for the many photos I took and safe from dropping or theft. It was easy to attach and detach while leaving the lanyard end on my pants. I will use it whenever I need hands free fun.
customer_reviews.author: Sacramento Artist

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, reliable, & convenient
customer_reviews.text: This phone leash, in my opinion, would fit almost any phone. I have an android & am loving its convenience. Have to get used to having your phone hanging there, though, because you can bang it around. Still, I love not having to worry about pockets or purse or finding it when it rings. Very sturdy, strong, & reliable. I have a magnetic case & it doesn't even interfere with the magnetic mount. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Tracie D

customer_reviews.title: foneleash 3 in 1 Universal Cell Phone Lanyard Neck Wrist and Hand Strap Tether (Black)
customer_reviews.text: Ribbon too wide for my Samsung Note 10+ case, *might* work with a different style case. Might help to have detailed instructions/pictures on how to use... I had to look at it a full 5 minutes to figure it out. Someone less technical might just give up. Aside from that, "ribbon" is sturdy. Lanyard well constructed, would feel safe using.
customer_reviews.author: KLMCats

customer_reviews.title: Meets my needs
customer_reviews.text: I like the convenience of this lanyard for when I do not want the phone in my purse because I might not hear it ring. No prolems leaving the lanyard on my phone while charging my phone wirelessly. I gave it 4 stars because the wrist part of it is too small. Unable to use my phone easily or properly when the phone is on the wrist strap only.
customer_reviews.author: Curious

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: Lanyard kept slipping so almost a phone drop ,ended up justtaking it off. Waste of money
customer_reviews.author: denise

customer_reviews.title: Covers 3 smartphone issues!
customer_reviews.text: When installed, and adds little to no thickness to your phone. You don't have to worry about setting on it due to carrying it in your back pocket. And it covers three different carrying issues. I only wish there was a way to .crossbody carry with it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kibler

customer_reviews.title: sturdy
customer_reviews.text: not afraid my phone will end up on the ground, had 2 other stretch silicon types that either broke or stretched out so much I was worried it would break unexpectedly. Am going to order one for my friend who keeps losing or misplacing her phone!
customer_reviews.author: puglady

customer_reviews.title: Best lanyard yet...
customer_reviews.text: This is the best phone landyard that is currently on the market. I feel my phone is very secure and unlike the silicone ones that stretches from corner, then snaps off. I would have given it 5 stars, but it's not adjustable for people that are short or have shorter torsos. But all in all, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Marie B

customer_reviews.title: Great for busy caregivers!
customer_reviews.text: I am a stay at home mom. I leave the house or go about town with so many things in my arms, and I’ve dropped my phone almost every day. I was looking for a solution to pair with my lanyard keychain when I came across this foneleash. I really love it so far! It’s a lot more secure than I expected it to be.
customer_reviews.author: LeNifty

customer_reviews.title: easy set up
customer_reviews.text: great for on the go, I wear my phone on my neck when doing chores and walking the dogs so if I drop it it doesn't fall to the ground! definitely recommend. I originally bought one for my Nintendo switch and now I have one for my cell phone too
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A. Brownlee

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I like this a lot. Instructions were easy. I thought the material will be thin and flimsy but it's actually thicker than I expected and seems sturdy enough. I didn't have issues with the fingerprint and charger port holes being used. Makes me feel that my phone secured and with me at all times. Phone may feel heavy on the neck though but that not this product's fault or issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dhelle Cuizon

customer_reviews.title: Great 3-way design.
customer_reviews.text: Really like the 3-way application: neck, wrist and hand. Easy install. Really glad there is no adhesive in this design. Strap is comfortable to use in all 3 applications. Using with Samsung S7 with Speck grip case. Can't accurately rate durability since I just received the strap. But hope it lasts a few years since I'll only use it on vacations and on trips into urban areas.
customer_reviews.author: Outta Here

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure about this product but wanted something to attach to my phone for when I went to a concert so I wouldn't end up dropping it. I thought I would use the lanyard but ended up detaching that part and putting my hand through the smaller part and it was very comfortable for a couple of hours and it felt secure. Also easy to get onto the phone and use.
customer_reviews.author: madmax

customer_reviews.title: very useful
customer_reviews.text: very useful strap, used it paragliding, horseback riding, hiking, fishing and hot air balloon riding in Jackson Hole. Kept my phone easily accessible and safe
customer_reviews.author: riad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product It was exactly what I was looking for This year I had 2 broken screens on my iPhone, which I spent 400 to replace, then I decided to buy a leash and a new case so I could protect my iPhone... This leash is amazing because I don’t need to take it off for nothing
customer_reviews.author: Pri

customer_reviews.title: Need alternative choice of Accessories for this item.
customer_reviews.text: Great idea except I prefer to wear a phone cross body and closer to my underarm so it isn't flapping around when I dance. Neck strap not long enuf. Seems like they could offer a longer strap as an alternative accessory. I'll have to construct a strap and attach it with a carabiner. I like the hand strap on the back of the phone so you don't need to grip it. Wrist strap is lost on me, I don't think I would ever use it. Not sure if strap won't fray, will see how it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sewn improperly
customer_reviews.text: The strap keeper is on the wrong side so it’s useless. The end of the strap flops around and isn’t held securely. I’m worried it will come loose and my phone would fall and break. Not taking a chance.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: You’ll look like a tourist but...
customer_reviews.text: So yes, a phone on a lanyard around your neck screams tourist, but it’s better than dropping it every where! We used it hiking and biking to keep our phones close for photos. I wish there was a second catch to secure it, but at least you don’t have to disassemble your phone to use it. The last day of the trip one of our straps had slid and got in a bunch of photos but that could have been avoided by checking how tight it’s installed.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Useful phone leash
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I went on an overseas sightseeing trip, and these leashes were great for keeping our phones handy for photo ops. As a plus, the short piece of the leash on the back of the phone is useful for holding the phone in your hand. Note, I have a Pixel 2 XL phone in an OtterBox and it worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Grandma Lion

customer_reviews.title: Worked like a charm
customer_reviews.text: I just used this to secure my phone to my PFD while on a canoe trip. I no longer fear dropping my phone in the lake. The quick release is nice, too, for when I'm out of the boat, the tether can remain on the PFD, but I can carry the phone around.
customer_reviews.author: Adam B Schwartz-Lowe

customer_reviews.title: CELL PHONE SECURITY
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of my two phones falling out of my shirt pocket all the time. I don't like to wear the belt clip & came across Foneleash as a solution and am glad I did, they work perfectly for me. However the only thing is you can't just let your phone hang down from your neck because as soon as you start to walk it will swing back & forth.
customer_reviews.author: PAUL R. SCAVUZZO

customer_reviews.title: Sense of security with smart phone
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product especially with travel across Europe and constant worry about phone in our hands... this gave us a sense of security. Super useful product and gives you flexibility of wristlet or neck strap... highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Momofthree

customer_reviews.title: Very Inconvenient
customer_reviews.text: Not a fault of the strap, but it didn't occur to me that I have to remove the phone from the case and reassemble it every time I want to use or not use the strap. So that doesn't work for me. It's useless.
customer_reviews.author: Di

customer_reviews.title: IT WAS A VERY GOOD PURCHASE AND I LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for your support with my lanyard. IT WAS A VERY GOOD PURCHASE AND I LOVE IT! I am excited to use it on my upcoming trip. I feel that my phone will be secure as I enjoy my time on holiday. Wishing you much success.
customer_reviews.author: ND person

customer_reviews.title: This works great!
customer_reviews.text: This item was packaged carefully, and instructions were clear & easy to follow- quick to put together & so far works great. I have mostly been using the wrist strap, & secure hand hold feature for every day, but I am excited to try out the attachable neck strap on my upcoming trip to Scotland. So far, so good, and charging my phone with the strap attached is no problem at all.
customer_reviews.author: mixed media maven

customer_reviews.title: Not for iPhone XR
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a cheap neck strap to carry my XR. I received a "cheap" strap worth about a quarter. It is worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Aona

customer_reviews.title: Best decision I ever made!
customer_reviews.text: I dropped my note 10 plus once and ever since that day I decided to buy this product to help protect my investment. I managed to still use it with my otee case at the bottom since it's very sturdy yet slender. Since thenn I've never dropped it since. You are saving yourself so many potential drops and future damages with this product. I got the preppy color, it is so pretty and I highly recommend it! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Destroys apearence of any phone like you wraped a rope around it.
customer_reviews.text: Get the lasso version this one looks ridicous wraped around your phone.
customer_reviews.author: Verrically&HorizontallyChallenged

customer_reviews.title: Not as adjustable as you’d think.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mom after she broke her hip, so she could always have her phone on her. It’s built well and made of nice material. However, it comes at a certain length that isn’t adjustable. She wears this one sweater that has pockets and has to keep it in there; otherwise, it’s kind of in the way when she walks.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Works well.
customer_reviews.text: For travel it worked as I had hoped. I didn’t expect to want to use it daily but the wristlet part works better than I expected. bit find it works a lot better than pop ups. Fits in my small purse and helps me find my phone when it’s in a larger bag.
customer_reviews.author: TAL

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought this for my Mother who has a muscle disorder and tends to drop her phone often. The strap is cute, she loves the pattern but we did notice that the strap comes out of the tension piece (lack of better word) easily so we put tape around it and that seems to have fixed it.
customer_reviews.author: kayliwilliamson

customer_reviews.title: Need to redesign
customer_reviews.text: After you install it, it puts the front screen off balance and therefore you can’t press about half of the APPS on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great find
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I wear outfits with no pockets most of the time, and I always have this strap in my work bag so when I have to leave my office I can just have my phone hanging!
customer_reviews.author: Sayaka

customer_reviews.title: Handy Accessory
customer_reviews.text: The foneleash leaves your hands free to enjoy activities without worrying about where to put your phone. Easy to attach and easy to use. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Llenaj

customer_reviews.title: Fits Samsung S8+.
customer_reviews.text: Just received Foneleash and installed it. Will evaluate its features and durability after it's been used.
customer_reviews.author: C Cable

customer_reviews.title: Recommended for extra protection
customer_reviews.text: Good product! I travel internationally quite a bit and always have my phone out to take photos. This allows me to have an extra layer of security for my phone by having it pooped around my wrist
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What is wrong!
customer_reviews.text: Nice item. Good Price. Can drive you a little nuts installing. When done right the cell should hang around your neck face forward and upside down. The red stitch should also face forward. If not just switch the plastic buckle that is on the wrist strap around. You see the first one was right and the second one was placed wrong. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John J Bartoszewicz

customer_reviews.title: Holding up nicely
customer_reviews.text: My child isn't particularly rough with it, so can't say how durable it is under different conditions, but this is holding up well, functions well, and looks great too!
customer_reviews.author: Special Apps, Special Kids

customer_reviews.title: Won’t  lose your phone with this one!!😃🙏🏽
customer_reviews.text: I love this leash for the phone it’s great and keeping it secure in front of me. I use it for my delivery service when I need my phone near me to scan items and not to keep pulling it out of my pocket👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Babygirl

customer_reviews.title: Not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very cumbersome. Not convenient dangling from neck. I barely use it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Obsessed!
customer_reviews.text: Best invention ever! 5 stars or let's make it 10! My coworker got me hooked and I recommend this to everyone! Do not leave the house with out it!
customer_reviews.author: Marysiad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect solution for traveling!
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I need for traveling. I use my phone as my camera and I’m always afraid I’m going to drop it in the water or off a cliff. This will definitely keep my phone secure! I also like to keep my phone in the pocket of my backpack but always worry someone will snatch it out. With the leash, I can secure it to the bag knowing it won’t fall out and less chance of pickpocketing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: I love the foneleash! I initially bought it for my daughter who kept losing her phone on the bus. We attached the foneleash to the key clip inside her backpack so she hasn't lost her phone since. I have bought myself one as well when I go to places without a purse. It's convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish for what it is, comfy, works great with Moto G6 in case
customer_reviews.text: The installation was quick and easy, but you must have the right case for it to work. Check your dimensions of your phone's case carefully. The instructions were clear. I can use it as a neckstrap or a handstrap. I am only 5'3" so it hangs a little long on me, but it is very secure and so it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Everyone asks me where I got it. Havent dropped my phone once since I had it. Use the lanyard when at the gym....no more boob dialing! Great would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Excellent idea
customer_reviews.text: To secure my phone and carry around my neck. Only wish that part of the leash was adjustable so I could shorten or lengthen as needed. Otherwise very pleased so far
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: How did I ever get by without this?!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing—especially for traveling. I always know where my phone is now and have no fear of dropping it or leaving it somewhere. Doesn’t interfere with wireless charger either with my iPhone xr
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen M.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Nice product, put it on and it works great. Will have to see if it holds up when I'm actually out doing things. It doesn't impede on the back camera however, it cover the flash so I am not able to use the flash when this is on my case unless I loosen it and move it out of the way.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Keep control of your Phone
customer_reviews.text: This phone leash is a lifesaver! Never worry about where are you going to put your phone. When all else fails, just put it on this lanyard & always know where the phone is. Great for everyone to have!
customer_reviews.author: SDW

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: My son was always losing his phone, he would put it down to look at something and walk away. I know i was SMH too. With this product its always around his neck, he can look at something or take a pic walk away he doesn't lose his phone. Its easy to put on the phone and if he needs to unhook it no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kenzie1mom

customer_reviews.title: Handy & Protector
customer_reviews.text: This leash makes walks with my dog and exercise convenient. I don't lose or drop my phone and more. It's super handy
customer_reviews.author: Loren

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Purchased one for me and one for my daughter when I saw the passenger next to me on a flight with it. She loved it and so do we! I love that I can unclasp the lanyard and have the leash on my wrist when I need to. Very durable and good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Susan C.

customer_reviews.title: It serves the purpose I bought it for.
customer_reviews.text: I order this strap to secure my phone while taking photos and videos in places where if I drop my phone it will certainly be lost or broken. Bridges, car windows, mountainside. It serves my above purpose. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: beau runningen

customer_reviews.title: It works exactly as intended
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, the detachable end is very handy for charging and the lanyard is the perfect length away from your face
customer_reviews.author: Martin S. Yearout

customer_reviews.title: Handy & hands-free
customer_reviews.text: Best lanyard I’ve tried thus far. It’s convenient & holds my iPhone X securely. I love that I can loop it around my hand or wrist at anytime or just clip it to the neck strap. Comes in handy while I’m working as a personal shopper.
customer_reviews.author: CMac

customer_reviews.title: Very secure with no sticky tape on my phone or case.
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy it was to attach to my case, I have the clear thin case on my S8 and it is very secure. I also like that I am not sticking anything on to my phone or case. I would recommend this strap.
customer_reviews.author: Army

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This Foneleash was exactly what I was looking for. Since the iPhone 11 is larger than I am used to, this strap makes me less fearful of dropping it. The Foneleash fits nicely in the case and the directions were easy to follow. I like this much better than “sticking” something to my case.
customer_reviews.author: C.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to grip easily with hand hold and/or hang on my neck to facilitate quick use. No need to scramble in my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Bajajo

customer_reviews.title: Works with my Samsung Galaxy S7
customer_reviews.text: You have to have a case (Like an Otterbox), but with the case the strap works well. Requires re-tightening once in a while, but that's not much bother.
customer_reviews.author: David Wihowski

customer_reviews.title: will re purchase
customer_reviews.text: love this. i Shipt shop and it makes it so much easier to just be able to drop my phone and let it hang from my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Kaytlin

customer_reviews.title: works well with Otter case for Galaxy S9
customer_reviews.text: Instructions are good, and the lanyard holds better than the type that wraps the phone. Wish the strap was a little shorter where it's attached to the case.
customer_reviews.author: kendall orcutt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product. Second time buyer
customer_reviews.text: Second time I buy this product. I bought one initally for my husband who tends to drop his phone on a daily basis. No more dropping. And I am sold on it. So I got one for myself as well so that I do not have to always wear something with pockets to stow away my phone
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: used at a festival
customer_reviews.text: worked great, I used the neck strap and wrist strap and it made taking pictures more convenient and still having to open hands to use when not taking pics.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: The best for any phone!!! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and works with iPhone X as well! Will be buying other colors for sure!! Perfect for festivals!!! The best fone leash there is! You can actually wear it all day. It’s super comfortable and I love that it snaps apart quickly! I take it to everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great for travelers
customer_reviews.text: I can wrap the strap around my purse (across shoulder) strap and take a picture without worrying about dropping it. Also while in Europe it was it was a nice anti theft item. Back from Europe and still using it.
customer_reviews.author: AGNH

customer_reviews.title: Greaaaat
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. Easy to assemble and the 3 in 1 features are a plus for sure! It was also received in a timely manner, thanks guys!
customer_reviews.author: Ms. MoohVinOn ... ;-)

customer_reviews.title: Will keep you from losing your phone!
customer_reviews.text: This was super convenient during a recent 2 week vacation. This allows you to have your phone close, but without worrying about leaving it in a place you know you wouldn’t be able to retrace. The lanyard is a comfortable length and you still have the ability to remove part of the strap in case you need to charge your phone, etc.
customer_reviews.author: ELT

customer_reviews.title: It works great
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to attach to my cell phone. It was a little hard getting the Otter box cover off and back on, but other then that it works like it's supposed to. Feel safe and secure with my cell around my neck for traveling or hiking.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Orwell

customer_reviews.title: Does not work
customer_reviews.text: This product is not a good one. It broke the first day.
customer_reviews.author: BJ

customer_reviews.title: Wrist strap section is too small - see UPDATE
customer_reviews.text: Good product overall. However, as mentioned in previous review, wrist strap section is too small for my hand to fit through comfortably. I can't operate the camera with my hand through the wrist strap. UPDATE: Today I received a replacement foneleash that was provided by directly by Marventures, LLC. The replacement has a larger wrist strap opening, which fits comfortably. Many thanks for the prompt response!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fabulous! I bought it for a trip to Europe so I could keep my camera handy (and protect from theft). Works exactly as described and is well made. It’s not uncomfortable or scratchy around the wrist.
customer_reviews.author: Allie

customer_reviews.title: Clip holding phone to leash seems a bit fragile
customer_reviews.text: Just as advertised. The clip is plastic and does not seem to be very sturdy so I do not trust it entirely.
customer_reviews.author: sherry

customer_reviews.title: Used it for months works good
customer_reviews.text: Works well have been using it for months the only this is the slider isn't super secure. O have to keep tightening it.... I hasn't every come off but wanted to mention it
customer_reviews.author: Deja aka Alilish Suki

customer_reviews.title: Very durable!
customer_reviews.text: So pretty and helps to keep phone from falling neck or wrist capability.very strong and nice looking
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, handy to have
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great purchase! I thought I would only use it for our cruise, but I use it for everyday. It keeps my phone handy and easy to find.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Keeps phone safe
customer_reviews.text: Keeps phone safe and near by, keeps from accidental drops, use wit note 8 and looped through case.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan
